snippet.title: The Shrouded Isle: Sunken Sins DLC Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Buy the game: http://store.steampowered.com/app/501320/The_Shrouded_Isle/

A strategy-focused free DLC plunges your favorite cult management simulator into more brain-bending waters than ever before. Send villagers into the Tower of Purification. Inquire after their vices and virtues. Sacrifice the sinners.
